word: "For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him should not perish, but have everlasting life." John 3:16. Our health institutions must be conducted on life saving principles. Those who are suffering because of transgression of physical laws are to be taught that transgression of the laws of nature is the transgression of the law of God. "If thou wilt enter into life," Christ says, "keep the commandments." Matthew 19:17. Live out my law "as the apple of thine eye." Proverbs 7:2.
